definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Playing computer games all day lavishes parents' hard-earned money.
sentences.chinese: 整天玩电脑游戏浪费父母的血汗钱。

sentences.english: Forget about throwing billions more of taxpayer money at Motown.
sentences.chinese: 别再打算拿几十亿纳税人血汗钱往汽车城打水漂了。

sentences.english: If you are smart, you will spend your hard-earned money (or your parents') somewhere else.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是聪明的，你会花你的血汗钱在其他地方。

sentences.english: There laws are very stringent and anybody swindles public money will be executed.
sentences.chinese: 法律应该严惩那些企图骗取人民血汗钱的恶人。

sentences.english: So which deserves your hard-earned cash?
sentences.chinese: 那么，谁更对得起你的血汗钱呢？

sentences.english: Playing computer games squanders parents' hard-earned cash.
sentences.chinese: 打游戏机浪费父母的血汗钱。

sentences.english: The American People need to know who is costing them their hard earned money.
sentences.chinese: 美国人民需要知道是谁把他们的血汗钱给糟蹋了。

sentences.english: But I dont know whether I can get back my hard-earned money or not.
sentences.chinese: 但我不知道我能否找回我的血汗钱与否。

sentences.english: Fooling around with hard-earned savings is asking for trouble.
sentences.chinese: 有了点血汗钱就游手好闲，那是自寻烦恼。

sentences.english: How to make good use of money in advertising investment?
sentences.chinese: 杨柳新年，一把广告血汗钱应该怎么投？

sentences.english: The money is made from fresh and blood of my parents.
sentences.chinese: 这是父母赚回来的血汗钱。

definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
to live frugally/to economize on food and clothing/to scrimp and save
to owe a debt/the sum owed
to lose everything one invested (idiom)/to lose one's shirt
to struggle to get free/to strive to acquire/to make (money)
to skip stones (on water)/(coll.) to squander one's money on a bad investment
to be in debt/to be saddled with debts
